events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn’t fit as expected and I would like to request a refund. The item arrived quickly but it’s just not the right size for me.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer is requesting money back due to sizing issues with their purchase.
The refund request has been assigned to agent Sarah for further handling and customer support.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return the jacket you purchased. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 67895432. The jacket is completely new, still with tags attached and packed as it arrived.
Thank you for the information. We will arrange a prepaid shipping label for you to return the jacket, and once we receive it, a full refund will be issued to your original payment method.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I’ll send the jacket back today.
I have emailed you the return shipping label. Please use it to send back the jacket, and you will receive the refund within 5-7 business days after we get the package.
We’re following up to confirm that you have received the refund for your returned jacket. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
As the refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us and have a great day!
